details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.1.3 File trailer - EOF
details.description: No data shall follow the last end-of-file marker as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, 7.5.5.

rule.description: No data shall follow the last end-of-file marker as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, 7.5.5.

error.message: Data is present after the last end-of-file marker
